  physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the publication \u0027The Orient Illustrated Weekly\u0027. The title is printed at the top of the page. The page features seven black-and-white photographs depicting scenes of India on India\u0027s independence day. There are captions at the bottom of the page. The edges of the page is slightly torn
 especially at the bottom.

  sgcool_label_text: \Prior to the World War II period
 Indians in Singapore and Malaya retained strong political
 sentimental and economic ties with their home country. Anti-colonial thoughts and actions
 inspired by the \\call for freedom\\ in India

metadata.title_text: The Orient India Celebrates Her Independence Day
metadata.physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the publication 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly'. The title is printed at the top of the page. The page features seven black-and-white photographs depicting scenes of India on India's independence day. There are captions at the bottom of the page. The edges of the page is slightly torn, especially at the bottom.
